content: cuddle-up and stay toasty under some turf with this cozy crochet blanket designed with football lovers in mind the simple stripes of the field create a modern and graphic look while the 50-yard motifs are sure to please any sports fan pattern is easy to make with single_crochet double_crochet and easy color changes customize your blanket by changing up the end zone colors then snuggle-up to watch the game in comfort and warmth yarns for model bernat® blanket™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast a lapis 10800 1 ball or 118 yds/108 m contrast b vintage white 10006 2 balls or 404 yds/369 m contrast c malachite 10802 5 balls or 1100 yds/1005 m bernat® blanket brights™ 10 5 oz/300 g 220 yds/201 m contrast d race car red 12001 1 ball or 118 yds/108 m
